Download TIGER shapes for Voting Districts

Source: R/voting_districts.R
tt_voting_districts.Rd

Download TIGER shapes for Voting Districts

Usage

tt_voting_districts(state, county, year = 2021)

Arguments

state

FIPs, postal codes, or full name of states.

county

FIPs codes or full name of counties. Optional.

year

Integer year. Required. Years < 2012 are not currently supported.

Value

sf data.frame

Examples

tt_voting_districts('DE', county = '001')
#> Downloading congressional districts for decade 2020.
#> Simple feature collection with 67 features and 14 fields
